name: EasyNewsletter
author: FARN â€“ digital brand design

sections.description:
Create and send your newsletters directly in the WordPress block editor with your existing content and theme.

Easy Newsletter is a simple and privacy-compliant email marketing solution that is seamlessly integrated into your WordPress environment. You retain full control over all data and are not dependent on external providers.

your advantages

  • Easy to use: Use your theme and your familiar WordPress environment to create newsletters.
  • Fully compatible: Integrate all your content, media, blocks, posts, custom post types and more.
  • Privacy compliant: All data remains secure in your WordPress database on your server.
  • Independent: No dependency on external providers and servers, no running costs.

functions

  • Create and send the newsletter directly in the WordPress block editor
  • Registration form with double opt-in, automatic welcome email and spam protection
  • Subscriber overview with editable data directly in the list
  • Settings for design, dispatch interval, standard emails, subscriber categories and co.
  • Automatic conversion of the newsletter template into e-mail-compatible HTML for optimum display in all common e-mail clients
  • Support for custom post types and meta fields
  • Unlimited number of subscribers and newsletters
  • Sending test emails directly in the newsletter template
  • Newsletter dashboard with overview of subscribers, newsletters and dispatch status
  • Function to stop the current newsletter dispatch
  • Integrate newsletter attachments directly from the media library
  • Use personalised user data/meta fields in the newsletter content
  • Compatible with the most popular SMTP plugins

Links

  • Website
  • Documentation
  • Getting started
  • Pro version

Features of the Pro version

  • Set complex dispatch conditions (e.g. based on the subscriber category or custom meta fields)
  • Compatible with WordPress user list
  • Schedule newsletters / send them automatically later
  • Import subscribers via CSV file
  • Newsletter statistics on opening rates
  • Newsletter statistics on clicks
  • Double query of the e-mail address in the registration form

Upgrade to Pro version
